features: 💧💝【Compact and Multipurpose Design】Its design takes into account the convenience and comfort of your use. The diameter is 10CM/3.93 inches, which does not take up space, can be put away when not in use. Suitable for personal travel, business trips and personal small clothing laundry, put it in the bucket,kitchen sink,bathroom sink.

💧💝【Alter-saving and Energy-saving】The mini portable washing machine has a convenient design,which not only saves one-third of water, but also saves much electricity.(Note:Only suitable for small clothes,dish or fruit.If the washing machine cannot be turned, it may be due to too little water or too much clothes)

💧💝【Eco Friendly and Durable Materials】This mini washing machine is made of environmentally friendly ABS and TPR materials. It is safe,odorless and has a long service life,very suitable for your light personal laundry.

💧💝【High frequency vibration cleaning】High-frequency vibration waves accelerate the dispersion of liquids and stains, effectively remove dirt. It can be used not only for socks,underwear,but also for towels,baby clothes,fruit,dish and makeup brushes.
💧💝【USB Powered And Multipurpose】Powered by the USB cable, you can use it as you like. It is suitable for light clothing and personal laundry,which will not damage your clothing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TECH SPECS 1.Base plate material: High-quality ABS 2.Power supply: USB 3.Rated power: 20W 4.Diameter: 10cm

Powered by USB cable,avoid power failure. Great for small items like underwear, baby clothes, masks, and does not twist clothes,also can be used to wash ,vegetables,fruits and dishes. It is the best choice for housewives. This mini washing machine upgrades the turbo fan blades,strengthens the vibration intensity,which can save one-third of the water,fast and effective cleaning ability is your first choice in the journey of life. The portable mini washing machine is made of high quality PP and TPR materials,the unique cleaning frequency vibration accelerates the dispersion of liquids and stains to achieve the purpose of cleaning.
This portable washing machine has upgraded the bottom suction cups,increased the number of bottom suction cups and the suction area,so that it can be better installed without falling.

The washing machine is small in size and easy to store,very suitable for narrow spaces,such as dormitories,apartments, RVs,etc. And it's good for personal travel or business trips,it can be placed in a handbag or luggage without taking up space. reviews.reviewText: Habe es vor 2 Jahre gekauft, hält immer noch bombenfest und sieht schick aus.
Ottimo prodotto e facile da montare il biadesivo ha un grip elevato e resistente anche se si appoggiano oggetti nella parte superiore del porta rotolo.
Me gusta la idea y el formato. No me gusta que está poco pulido y que el precio me parece caro. Lo demás todo bien.

Très bon dérouleur, de bonne qualité, aux finitions impeccables.Bien robuste, le métal est épais, c'est du costaud !Look sympa, facile à installer et colle très bien (sur mur peint en tous cas). Je vous conseille d'être sûr de vous au moment de la pose, parce que je ne suis pas certaine que vous aurez une 2e chance ! D'un autre côté, ça ne risque pas de tomber... Fourni avec la visserie si jamais vous préférez le fixer de cette façon.Tablette très pratique pour poser son téléphone, même si un peu juste en taille (mon smartphone pourtant pas spécialement grand dépasse un peu en longueur, j'aurais préféré une tablette plus grande).Ultra simple de changer le rouleau de papier toilette, y'a juste à faire glisser sur la tige ça prend 2 sec, j'apprécie ! Et en même temps le rouleau reste bien en place une fois mis, c'est bien conçu.Donc un excellent produit, j'en suis très contente, je recommande chaudement !Si cet avis vous a été utile, un petit clic sur le bouton ça fait toujours plaisir :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 16, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I chose to buy this product because it not only looks nice, but it also looked as if it would be easy to install, and I was right. I did not even have to do any drilling. I simply unscrewed my old toilet roll holder, (which had a missing bar) and I screwed this one in. Unfortunately, the holes did not match up, but because this one had an adhesive back, it didn't matter. I simply screwed one of the screws in, left out the out the other, then pressed the unit to the wall, and it stuck fast! Doesn't even move when I try to move it. No one can see the missing screw when the toilet paper is in the holder. Great Product! I am sure it would probably stay stuck to the wall with just the adhesive and no screws. If you can't find the right bar for your toilet roll holder, or simply want to replace it, just buy this one. You won't regret it.
